TITLE: Development Setup for Linear MCP Server
DESCRIPTION: Steps to set up the development environment including cloning the repository, installing dependencies, and building the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone [repository-url]
cd linear-mcp
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Linear MCP Server with API Key
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run the Linear MCP server using an API key directly or from the environment variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
LINEAR_API_KEY=your-api-key npx @ibraheem4/linear-mcp
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
export LINEAR_API_KEY=your-api-key
npx @ibraheem4/linear-mcp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Issues with Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface for the create_issue tool, which allows creating new issues in Linear with customizable properties including title, description, team, assignee, priority, and labels.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
{
  title: string;          // Required: Issue title
  description?: string;   // Optional: Issue description (markdown supported)
  teamId: string;        // Required: Team ID
  assigneeId?: string;   // Optional: Assignee user ID
  priority?: number;     // Optional: Priority (0-4)
  labels?: string[];     // Optional: Label IDs to apply
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Issues with Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface for the update_issue tool, which modifies existing issues by changing properties like title, description, status, assignee, priority, and labels.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
{
  issueId: string;       // Required: Issue ID
  title?: string;        // Optional: New title
  description?: string;  // Optional: New description
  status?: string;      // Optional: New status
  assigneeId?: string;  // Optional: New assignee ID
  priority?: number;    // Optional: New priority (0-4)
  labels?: string[];   // Optional: Label IDs to apply to the issue
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Issues with Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface for the list_issues tool, which retrieves issues with optional filters for team, assignee, status, and result count.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
{
  teamId?: string;      // Optional: Filter by team ID
  assigneeId?: string;  // Optional: Filter by assignee ID
  status?: string;      // Optional: Filter by status
  first?: number;       // Optional: Number of issues to return (default: 50)
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Getting Issue Details with Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface for the get_issue tool, which retrieves detailed information about a specific issue using its ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
{
  issueId: string; // Required: Issue ID
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Projects with Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript interface for the list_projects tool, which retrieves projects with optional filtering by team and control over the number of results returned.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
{
  teamId?: string;     // Optional: Filter by team ID
  first?: number;      // Optional: Number of projects to return (default: 50)
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Linear MCP with Inspector for Debugging
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up and run the MCP Inspector for local development and debugging of Linear MCP.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g supergateway
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
chmod +x run.sh
LINEAR_API_KEY=your-api-key ./run.sh
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
node /Users/ibraheem/Projects/linear-mcp/build/index.js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Linear MCP in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: Command to run the Linear MCP server in development mode with auto-rebuild functionality for continuous development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run watch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: VS Code Extension (Cline) Configuration for Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for the Cline VS Code extension to enable the Linear MCP server with appropriate settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "linear-mcp": {
      "command": "node",
      "args": ["/path/to/linear-mcp/build/index.js"],
      "env": {
        "LINEAR_API_KEY": "your-api-key-here"
      },
      "disabled": false,
      "alwaysAllow": []
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Claude Desktop Configuration for Linear MCP
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for Claude Desktop to enable the Linear MCP server, specifying command, arguments, environment variables and permissions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/ibraheem4/linear-mcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-14_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "linear-mcp": {
      "command": "node",
      "args": ["/path/to/linear-mcp/build/index.js"],
      "env": {
        "LINEAR_API_KEY": "your-api-key-here"
      },
      "disabled": false,
      "alwaysAllow": []
    }
  }
}
```
